game.name: Batman: The Enemy Within - The Telltale Series
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this latest chapter from the award-winning studio behind Batman - The Telltale Series, both Bruce Wayne and Batman will be forced into precarious new roles. The Riddler has returned to terrorize Gotham City, but his gruesome puzzles merely foreshadow an even greater crisis.
